name: phylum
description: Phylum is a static analysis tool that runs as a self-hosted web app, designed to evaluate software supply chain risks by analyzing dependencies and code security.

features.title: Dependency Analysis
features.description: Scan project dependencies to identify security vulnerabilities and supply chain risks

features.title: Risk Scoring
features.description: Assign risk scores to packages based on security, quality, and maintenance indicators

features.title: Vulnerability Detection
features.description: Identify known CVEs and security issues in third-party dependencies

features.title: License Compliance
features.description: Track and report on software licenses to ensure compliance with organizational policies

features.title: Package Monitoring
features.description: Continuously monitor dependencies for new vulnerabilities and updates

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: View analysis results and risk reports through an intuitive web interface

features.title: Multi
features.description: Analyze dependencies from npm, PyPI, Maven, and other package ecosystems

features.title: Ci/cd Integration
features.description: Integrate security checks into build pipelines to catch issues before deployment
